info.name: Kaos Warden
info.description: A homebrew subclass for those who draw power from their bond with nature and the chaotic spirits of the wild, mastering elemental beasts and primal forces.
info.author: Crimson's Homebrew

p.description: Your innate magic stems from your deep bond with nature and the chaotic spirits of the wild, embodied by your mastery over elemental beasts and ancient natural forces.

sheet.description: Your innate magic stems from your deep bond with nature and the primal chaos of the wild, embodied by your mastery over natural spirits and primal instincts.

element.name: Wyldheart Companion
element.description: Summon a Wyldheart Companion to aid you in battle.

sheet.description: Summon a Wyldheart Companion to aid you in battle.

element.name: Blessing of the Wyld
element.description: Your connection to the Wyld grants you a permanent boost to cantrip damage based on your Wisdom modifier

sheet.description: Your connection to the Wyld grants you a permanent boost to cantrip damage based on your Wisdom modifier

description.p: At 3rd level, your bond with the primal chaos grants you a savage gift. Choose one of the following blessings shaped by the wild:

Release a pulse of primal energy. Allies within 10 feet gain temporary HP equal to your ((Wisdom modifier + Proficiency bonus) x Kaos Warden level)/3. Enemies must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + Proficiency + Wisdom modifier) or be pushed 10 feet and have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

Once per turn, when a creature within 10 feet hits you or your Wyld Companion, use your reaction to retaliate. The attacker takes force damage equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier, scaling as follows: 1d6 at Warden level 1–4 / 2d6 at Warden level 5–10 / 3d6 at Warden level 11–16 / 4d6 at Warden level 17+. The attacker must also make a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + Proficiency + Wisdom modifier) or be knocked prone.

Once per long rest, when your Wyld Companion drops to 0 HP, erupt in a 15-foot blast of primal energy. Creatures of your choice must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + Proficiency + Wisdom modifier). On a failed save, they take force damage equal to 2d6 per 3 Warden levels (rounded up)(Half on a success). For example: 1–2 = 2d6, 3–5 = 4d6, 6–8 = 6d6, etc. Targets are also blinded until the end of their next turn. Allies are unaffected.
Once per short rest, release a pulse of primal energy as a reaction to a melee attack.
Allies within 10 feet gain temporary HP equal to your ((Wisdom modifier + Proficiency bonus) x Kaos Warden level)/3.
Enemies must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + Proficiency + Wisdom modifier) or be pushed 10 feet and have disadvantage on their next attack roll.
